# ControlGroupStyleConfiguration.Content

**Structure**

A type-erased content of a `ControlGroup`.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct Content
```

## Configuring the content

- **content**: A view that represents the content of the `ControlGroup`.

## Conforms To

- View

items.description: A view that represents the content of the `ControlGroup`.
